Package au.csiro.pathling.security

Class SecurityConfiguration

java.lang.Object
au.csiro.pathling.security.SecurityConfiguration
@Configuration @EnableWebSecurity @Profile("server") public class SecurityConfiguration extends Object
Web security configuration for Pathling.
